question: What is my trading performance and account activity over the past 30 days?
name: Trading Performance Dashboard
description: Comprehensive view of trading performance and account activity over past 30 days.
workflow: 1. Get Account Overview: Call /v2/account to get current account status, portfolio value, buying power, pattern day trader flags
2. Get Portfolio History: Call /v2/account/portfolio/history with period='30D' and timeframe='1D' to get daily portfolio performance and P&L
3. Get Current Positions: Call /v2/positions to get all open positions with market values and unrealized P&L
4. Get Account Activities: Call /v2/account/activities with after=(30 days ago) to get all trading fills and non-trading activities like dividends
5. Calculate Performance Metrics: Process portfolio history to calculate total return, best/worst days, win/loss ratio from activities
6. Display Dashboard: Show account overview cards, portfolio performance chart, position allocation pie chart, and recent activity table with tabs
